alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Southern San Luis Valley; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 5:01AM MST until January 08 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southern San Luis Valley, Fremont County Below 8500 Feet, Wet Mountain Valley,and Eastern Fremont County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
